short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove banger alert spams from comment section of mangakakalot & manganato

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gets rid of the annoying spam messages in the Facebook comment section on mangakakalot.com & manganelo.com (and any other sites that use the same technology)

Feature include:
- Remove the spam completely
- Replace it with an image
- Replace it with text (HTML is allowed)
- Custom banned words
